title: How to Make Dill Bread

steps.headline: Heat cottage cheese and butter to lukewarm.
Combine all ingredients, except flour in large bowl.
Add flour gradually to form stiff dough.
Cover and let rise for 50-60 minutes or until double in bulk.
Stir down and put into a greased bread pan.
Let rise again until double in size.
Spread top with butter while hot.

text: Heat cottage cheese and butter to lukewarm.  Combine all ingredients, except flour in large bowl.  Mix.  Add flour gradually to form stiff dough.  Cover and let rise for 50-60 minutes or until double in bulk.  Stir down and put into a greased bread pan.  Let rise again until double in size.  Bake at 325 °F (163 °C) until golden brown.  Spread top with butter while hot.
